Name: Percentage of SW-Awaiting EIC Decision out of all activity executions in the event log
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision' out of all cases

Name: Frequency of SW-Awaiting EIC Decision occurrences across all cases
Percentage of variants that contain SW-Awaiting EIC Decision
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision' out of all cases

Name: Frequency of SW-Awaiting EIC Decision being directly preceded by SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation
Frequency of SW-Awaiting EIC Decision appearing after SW-Reviewer Agreed in the same case
Metric: Number of 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision' activities for cases where activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' occurs

Name: Percentage of cases where SW-Reviewer Agreed occurs and is eventually followed by SW-Awaiting EIC Decision
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' out of all 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision'

Name: Ratio of SW-Awaiting EIC Decision occurrences to SW-Reviewer Agreed occurrences
Frequency of SW-Awaiting EIC Decision in cases that include at least one reviewer agreement (SW-Reviewer Agreed)
Metric: Number of 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision' activities for cases where activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' occurs

Name: Percentage of SW-Awaiting EIC Decision occurring within 30 days after the first SW-Reviewer Agreed in the same case
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision' out of all cases

Name: Frequency of SW-Awaiting EIC Decision appearing in variants with more than three reviewer-related activities (e.g., SW-Reviewer Agreed, SW-Reviewer Declined, SW-Reviewer No Response)
Percentage of SW-Awaiting EIC Decision that are not followed by any further activity (i.e., terminal state in incomplete cases)
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision' out of all cases

Name: Ratio of SW-Awaiting EIC Decision occurrences to total number of SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation occurrences
Percentage of SW-Awaiting EIC Decision followed by SW-EIC Accept, SW-EIC Reject, SW-EIC Major Revision, or SW-EIC Minor Revision
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision' out of all cases

Name: Percentage of SW-Awaiting EIC Decision that occur in variants leading to a final editorial decision (e.g., SW-EIC Accept/Reject/Major/Minor Revision)
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision' out of all cases

Name: Frequency of SW-Awaiting EIC Decision per year to assess temporal trends in editorial bottlenecking
